# redoActionName

**Instance Property**

The name identifying the redo action.

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor var redoActionName: String { get }
```

## Discussion

The redo action name. Returns an empty string (`@""`) if no action name has been assigned or if there is nothing to redo.

For example, if the menu title is “Redo Delete,” the string returned is “Delete.”

## Managing the action name

- **undoActionName**: The name identifying the undo action.
- **setActionName(_:)**: Sets the name of the action associated with the Undo or Redo command using a localized string resource.
- **setActionName(_:)**: Sets the name of the action associated with the Undo or Redo command.
